A technique that allows [[Kabuto]] to liquefy his body and the snakes he controls at will, which he created after examining and altering the [[Hōzuki clan]]'s [[Hydrification Technique]]. 

== Usage ==
By partitioning parts of his body using his own bodily fluids, Kabuto is able to separate portions of himself in a manner reminiscent of a snake shedding its skin, similar to [[Orochimaru-Style Body Replacement Technique|another technique]], while leaving behind only trails of chakra-infused liquid. This allows him to escape from bindings and regenerate from attacks. Due to these resulting trails of fluid, Kabuto can inhibit [[Sensor|sensing techniques]] from detecting him, such as [[dōjutsu]]. He can also liquefy his insides to prevent himself from experiencing the harmful effects of [[Sage Art: White Rage Technique|intense sound vibrations]].<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 580, page 4</ref>
